airport: Airport to airport sevices (ATA) by cargo airlines (3 options)
globalWarehouseCenter: No Sales Tax Online - Only with Global Warehouse Center!
airShipmentParagraph: Discover the unparalleled efficiency and transparency of our air shipping sercies at Global Warehouse Center. We take pride in meticulously managing the intricacies of your cargo, providing a comprehensive range of services for a seamless experience.
airportOption1Paragraph: We try to find out the best shipping rates by airlines and we deliver the cargo directly from our facility
airportOption2Paragraph: We prepare the cargo ready to go under international air regulations and we deliver the cargo directly to the freight forwarder of your perference.
airportOption3Paragraph: We prepare the cargo ready to go under international air regulations and your freight forwarder picks up the freight directly from our facility.
globalWarehouseCenterParagraph: Great news! You are now exempt from paying the 7%*Florida tax when you shop at your favorite US stores thanks to our NEW GLOBAL WAREHOUSE CENTER TAX-FREE ADDRESS! All you need to do is update the address on each of your online store accounts with our shipping address.
airShipmentList1: Receiving your parcels from major carriers or walk in customers
airShipmentList6: Warehouse receipt per parcel after we finish each process (full visibility of your cargo in Miami). We use your online platform or our in-house platform.
airShipmentList7: We consolidate every single parcel for internacional shipping in courier bags or the way you required (palletized).
airShipmentList8: Cargo manifest per departure with all details of your cargo.
airShipmentList9: Local delivery to Air International Cargo terminal.
additionalServicesList6: Warehousing/3PL(Third party logistics)/Fulfillment / Pick - Pack - Ship
additionalServicesList7: OBC/On Board Courier for extremely urgent shipment worldwide
additionalServicesList8: NFO/Next Flight Out -We receive your shipment and we deliver the cargo in the next available flight on the same day.
additionalServicesList9: Cross-docking; We receive your cargo, we combine with another one if you required and we ship out within 24 hours in the next available flight.
additionalServicesList10: Warehousing for pallets (short or long term)
additionalServicesList11: Local pick-up and delivery within Miami-Dade County and nationwide.
maritimeServiceList2: We review the cargo per pallet received (check list).
maritimeServiceList3: We consolidate and ship it as LCL (Less-Than-Container Load).
maritimeServiceList4: We deliver to the NVOCC of your choice.
